## Willkommen zum [{{< fa brands r-project >}}]{.imp}-Workshop
```{r hidden chunk which creates template stuff}
#| echo: false

library(fontawesome)
library(tidyverse)
# Change css to lecker PH green
if(!dir.exists("css"))
dir.create("css")
fileConn<-file("css/custom.scss")
writeLines(c("/*-- scss:defaults --*/",
             "$link-color: #8cd000 !default;"), fileConn)
close(fileConn)

# create sash with URL
sash <- 
  ggplot() + 
  geom_polygon(data = tibble(x = c(0,4,5.5,0),
                             y = c(1,5,5,-.5)),
               aes(x,y), fill = "#8cd000") + 
  coord_fixed() +
  annotate(geom = "text", 
           label = "www.ph-ka.de", 
           x = .8, y = .8, 
           angle = 45,
           hjust = 0, vjust = 0,
           size = 17,
           color = "white") +
 theme_void() + 
 theme(plot.margin = margin(-2,0,0,-12, unit = "cm"))
ggsave("img/sash.svg", sash)
```
